titleStmt.title: The petition of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, delivered to His Majestie the 16. day of July: together with His Majesties answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill.,

notesStmt.note: "Charles R. Our expresse pleasure is, that this petition of the Lords and Commons, with our answer thereto, be read in all churches and chappells within the kingdom of England and dominion of Wales, by the parsons, vicars or curates of the same."
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
